agents.name: ShortGPT
agents.shortDescription: An AI-powered framework that automates video content creation from script to final render.
agents.longDescription: ShortGPT is an open-source Python framework designed to streamline and automate the entire video content creation process. It leverages AI to handle tasks like script generation, footage sourcing, voiceover synthesis, caption generation, and video editing. ShortGPT supports multiple languages and integrates with various asset sources, making it a powerful tool for content creators, marketers, and businesses looking to efficiently produce high-quality video content at scale
keyFeatures: Automated asset sourcing from the internet,
agents.tags: AI, content creation, video automation, open-source, Python

agents.name: TOPVIEW
agents.shortDescription: AI Viral Video Generator to turn links or media assets into viral videos in one click
agents.longDescription: Topview.ai offers an AI-powered video editing platform that transforms media assets into engaging marketing videos using advanced features like AI avatars, scriptwriting, and multilingual support, at a fraction of the cost and time of traditional editing.

agents.name: Face Swap AI
agents.shortDescription: Transform your videos with Face Swap AI: The easiest way to make realistic deepfakes in minutes.
agents.longDescription:
Face Swap AI is the perfect tool for anyone looking to create realistic deepfake videos quickly and easily. Whether you want to have some fun with friends, boost your marketing efforts, or keep your identity private in videos, our app makes it very simple. No need to worry about complicated editing software—our user-friendly platform does the hard work for you.
We also help you stay on the right side of copyright laws with built-in features designed to handle potential issues in your ads. Plus, you can surprise your friends by putting their faces into movies, or even become an influencer without ever showing your real face. It's all about making your videos unique and entertaining while keeping your personal info safe!
keyFeatures: Helping our users to create high quality and realistic contents easily and responsibly, create engaging and entertaining content, simplified process, and powerful features.
useCases: Face Swap AI is designed for a broad audience, including casual users, marketing agencies, companies, influencers, and privacy-conscious individuals. Whether you're looking to create fun videos for social media, enhance your marketing campaigns, or maintain anonymity in your content, our deepfake tool is tailored to meet your needs. Our platform's versatility and ease of use make it suitable for anyone interested in exploring deepfake technology.
agents.tags: AI Video Creation, AI Face Swap, AI Video Generator

agents.name: CapCut Commerce Pro
agents.shortDescription: End-to-End AI Content Creation Built for Commerce Scale and Performance
agents.longDescription:
CapCut Commerce Pro is an end-to-end platform that helps businesses and creators easily make and scale high-quality ads and creative content with AI-powered editing tools. It makes video and image generation super efficient for users by utilizing AI-Avatars and AI voice. 

What's CapCut Commerce Pro
- CapCut Commerce Pro is a content creation platform designed for businesses, e-commerce sellers, and creators to easily produce high-quality marketing content. Using AI-powered editing tools, users can quickly create professional marketing videos with just one click and generate high-quality visuals. CapCut Commerce Pro helps save time and resources with features like AI Avatars, AI Voice, AI Script, batch editing, and pre-cleared commercial te
keyFeatures: One Click Video Generation: Instantly generate videos with one-click. Creation is all done for you.
AI Custom Avatar: Abundant choice of customized AI Avatar and AI voice, saving partner hunting time.
AI Script: AI-generated video scripts to boost efficiency for video brainstorming and outlining.
Batch Edit: Batch edit with ease and scale up production.
Pre-Cleared Commercial Templates: Support creative templates for inspiration and commercial use
Schedule and Auto Publish: Arrange to post on multiple platforms
Social media analytics: Monitor content performance with data and
useCases: CapCut Commerce Pro is designed for e-commerce sellers, small-and-medium size businesses, and affiliate creators to create promotional videos for imagery for products. A variety of video options will be available for users to select and quickly edit to enhance video quality. Users can adjust the video script, AI avatar, voice, and media. They can continue editing by clicking "Edit More" to add filters, captions, text, audio, and more using CapCut Commerce Pro's editing tools. Once editing is complete, users can export their video with two options: auto-publish the video to their social media

agents.name: Director
agents.shortDescription: Build AI video agents that can reason through complex video tasks & instantly stream the results
agents.longDescription:
Think of Director as ChatGPT for videos. It is a framework to build video agents that can reason through complex video tasks like search, editing, compilation, generation etc & instantly stream the results.

For example, a simple natural language command like: Upload this video and send the highlights to my Slack, sets everything in motion - Director’s reasoning will orchestrate the different agents intelligently to complete the task for you.

Built on top of VideoDB’s ‘video-as-data’ infrastructure, Director enables you to:

Summarize videos in seconds.
Search for specific moments.
Create clips instantly.
Integrate top GenAI projects and APIs and create and edit content instantly.
Add overlays, generate thumbnails, and much more.
keyFeatures: 20+ pre-built video agents that you can customize
Summarize, edit, search & generate videos in seconds
Chat-based interface to interact with your media. Built-in video playback and intuitive controls
Connect seamlessly with powerful AI tools like LLMs, databases, and GenAI APIs
useCases: Video Search (surveillance, knowledge base, lectures etc...)

agents.name: Vidan.ai
agents.longDescription: Video analytics platform that contextualises real time video feed and generates valuable insights and alerts/reports based on your requirements. It is highly customisable and can be used to monitor and ensure safety, security, compliance among other things. Some basic features include: intrusion detection, people and object detection/count, weapon detection, fire and smoke detection etc.
useCases: Prevent and respond to fire or smoke breakouts

agents.name: HeyGen AI
agents.shortDescription: AI video agent making visual storytelling accessible to all.
agents.longDescription: HeyGen AI is an advanced video generation tool that leverages artificial intelligence to create high-quality, customizable videos with AI-generated avatars and voiceovers. It offers features like text-to-video creation, multilingual support, and voice cloning, enabling users to produce professional content quickly and cost-effectively. The platform caters to various industries, including marketing, education, and corporate training
